partintro.simpara: The mail function allows you to send mail.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Mail automatically mails the message specified in message to the receiver specified in to. Multiple recipients can be specified by putting a comma between each address in to.
If a fourth string argument is passed, this string is inserted at the end of the header. This is typically used to add extra headers. Multiple extra headers are separated with a newline.

example.title: Sending mail with extra headers.
example.programlisting: mail("nobody@aol.com", "the subject", $message, "From: webmaster@$SERVER_NAME\nReply-To: webmaster@$SERVER_NAME\nX-Mailer: PHP/" . phpversion());
